transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello, good afternoon sir.
Customer: Good afternoon sir.
Executive: Uh, sir, Narayan is speaking, I was trying to call you, I was getting a call, right? Sir, last time, ma'am had called, so Saturday was said for refund.
Customer: Uh, refund, your morning, I had ticket raised yesterday night, right? Now your this one next week may refund process ho jayega. Review bhi ho gaya na?
Customer: Wait karna padega. Unhone kaha tha Monday, Tuesday mein hai sir. Within do se teen din jo refund ka procedure hai na sir, bas usme time lagta hai. Review to already aap logo ka ho chuka hai.
Customer: Aap hai na mujhe wo ma'am aayegi na unse baat karwana please. Hai na?
Executive: Kaunsi madam se?
Customer: Pata nahi mujhe last time ma'am se baat hui thi. To unhone kaha tha.
Executive: Shriya se baat hui hogi aapki actually kyunki Shriya jo hai na wo aapka catalog dekhti hai. Mere ko review mila hai na sir.
Customer: Unhone mujhe kaha tha, suniye meri baat, unhone mujhse ye kaha tha Saturday ko confirm aapka payment aapke paas refund aa jayega.
Customer: To aap keh rahe hai ki ab ticket raise hui hai. Ab agle hafte tak.
Executive: Ticket kal hui hai sir, kal raise hui hai aur Saturday ki payment aapke paas aa jayega, ticket raise hote hi Saturday ko aapke paas payment pahunch jayega, teen din pehle baat hui thi.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Ab sir bataiye main kya karu isme?
Executive: Sir aapka ek do din mein payment aa jayega, aapki services already 12 tarikh ko close ho gayi hai, jis din aapne ticket raise kiya tha na, us din aapki services already close ho chuki hai. Aur uske baad ticket raise karke aapka refund ka jo procedure hai wo follow kar rahe hai aur wo aapka.
Customer: Kitna payment refund aa raha hai sir mera?
Executive: Uh, sir uska mail aana hai, jaise hi mail aayega main aapko ek baar bol bata dunga exactly. Maine aapka WhatsApp number bhi save kiya hua hai in fact so that main aapko refund ke saare details bhi bhej saku.
Customer: But sir ek cheez hai, mujhe Saturday ki date di gayi thi, ab Saturday pe phir aur ghumaaya ja raha hai.
Executive: Sir aap aapse aapse dekho meri pichle hafte mein jab baat hui thi yaad hoga aapne mujhse tab bhi bola tha ki do din aapne bole the, right? Maine aapko tab bhi bola tha sir main koi confirm date nahi de sakta but ha ye sure hai ki aapka payment.
Customer: Maine yehi unse discuss kiya tha ki meri sir se baat hui, sir ne kaha confirm date aap de sakti hai, unse isi baat.
Executive: To unhone de diya hoga.
Customer: Unhone kaha ki Saturday fix hai pakka aa jayega.
Executive: Nahi nahi aap dekho Saturday tak matlab hote Saturday tak bhi Saturday hai half day bank working rehta hai and all that kal ticket khuli hai aap do din mein aapka paisa automatically hamari taraf se process hoke refund bhi ho jayega. Aap kaunse account se kiye the is paise ko HDFC se kiye the kis se kiye batao?
Customer: HDFC HDFC.
Executive: HDFC se na jis account se aapne paisa pay kiya tha na bas ek baar usme hai na cross check kar lena. Baki mere paas jaise hi mail aata hai na accounts team se refund ka ki process ho gaya.
Customer: Sir message hi aa jayega bank ki taraf se but abhi kuch bhi update nahi.
Executive: Fir bhi ek baar cross check kar lena, kai baar kya hota hai message nahi aata hai bank se kyunki wo transaction wapas aata hai, fir bhi ek baar check kar lena agar aa gaya to theek hai.
Customer: Mere paas aa bhi gaya cross check to kar lunga main par mail wagera aa jata hai IndiaMART se kuch bhi nahi aaya na.
Executive: IndiaMART se mail refund ka is tarah se nahi aata sir jab wo refund process hoga na sir to hamare paas ek mail aati hai ki this much amount has got refunded as per your ticket open, right? Aur automatically wo jo.
Customer: Ticket aayegi mere paas se wo main aapko bhi forward karunga, right? Aur wo yaha par bhi mere paas update hogi, usme amount bhi likha hua hoga aur transaction details jo hai wo phir mujhe leni padegi agar aapko nahi milta hai to. Automatically waise to wo chala jata hai account mein koi problem hi nahi hogi usme.
Customer: To abhi aap ye keh rahe hai Monday ko confirm aa jayega.
Executive: Sir Monday phir maine aapko bola na ek se do din ka time banking usme kaam mein lagta hai to bank ka jo process hai usme time lagta hai.
Customer: Sir mujhe ab dekho aap confirm nahi batate yehi cheez hai aapki aise hi mujhe.
Executive: Sir aapko ye dekho maine aapko last time aap suno maine aapko last time confirm nahi bataya tha kyunki time lag jata hai us process mein ab Shriya ne confirm bataya ab aap wahi bol rahe ho ki Saturday tak.
Customer: Are sir main ye keh raha hu dekho aapne kya kaha ticket raise hoga ticket raise hoti ho jayega, hoti ho gaya ab keh rahe aap payment mein banking ka issue bata rahe ho. Usme kuch ho jayega phir kahoge aap upar hamare manager se thodi approval ho jayega uske baad mil jayega ab ye sir ghumaaya ja raha hai na. Wo cheez keh raha hu main aapse.
Executive: Aapko maine last time jo procedure bataya tha wo to aapko clear hoga na maine kya kya bataya tha aapko? Ki download hone ke liye review one hoga phir review two hoga phir ticket download.
Customer: Kuch nahi aaya, mere ko ye batao aap alag batate ho ma'am alag batati aapki policy alag cheez bolti hai hai kya system?
Executive: Ab sir jo hai aapke samne hai main to try kar raha hu ki aapka refund process ho jaye jaldi se jaldi.
Customer: Main to aapko samajhta hu sahi batau to meri samajh se bahar hai aapka pura system.
Executive: Please ek baar dekhiye aap ek baar baat kijiyega unse unhone Saturday ka naam.
Executive: Koi baat nahi main baat kar lunga unse, theek hai na? Aur aapka refund process kara ke main aapko WhatsApp pe confirm bhi kar deta hu ki kitna amount aapka ja raha hai jaise hi mere paas accounts team se update aa jati hai, theek hai sir?
Customer: Theek hai sir, thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer says refund was promised by Saturday.

- Customer says executive and ma'am give different information.



Resolution:

- Executive said refund process takes 2-3 days.

- Executive will confirm refund amount on WhatsApp.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, payment, ticket, saturday
